description: This file defines a React functional component named LoginForm, which provides a user interface for entering Jira credentials (email, domain, API token) and handles login interactions, including input management, form submission, and error display.

methods.name: LoginForm
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form for Jira credentials, managing input states, toggling token visibility, and handling form submission.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, prevents default behavior, clears errors, validates credentials, and calls the onLogin callback.

methods.name: handleInputChange
methods.description: Updates the credentials state when user inputs change and clears errors if any.
